content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Learn how to get the current URL with JavaScript. Current URL Use window.location.href to get the current URL address: Example document.getElementById("demo").innerHTML = "The full URL of this page is:
" + window.location.href; Read more about the window.location object in our JavaScript Window Location Tutorial . ★ +1
